amendment.description: Page 26, after line 2, insert the following: \ (5) CONSULTATION REQUIRED.--The Attorney General may not designate a high intensity interstate gang activity area without first consulting with and receiving comment from local elected officials representing communities within the State of proposed designation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 109-76 to require the Attorney General to seek input from local elected officials before designating an area as a "High-Intensity Interstate Gang Activity Area.".
